Description: Product Description Catalog #1681993422 Consider yourself an it-girl? Then this Riley watch by Marc Jacobs has your name all over it. Its stainless steel 37mm case creates a perfectly polished visage for any and every occasion, effortlessly demanding the attention of those around you. The case is beautifully balanced by its white dial as the two colors work together in stylish harmony. It also features arabic numerals which spices things up just the right amount, adding a touch of sophisticated flair to the whole piece, and the black hands contribute to its sleek theme. Its two-tone stainless-steel band is classy in color, yet unique in pattern. Who wouldn't notice a band like that? But don't be fooled. As alluring as this timepiece is, it's no featherweight. If you're a woman who's always up for an adventure, or maybe you're a slightly clumsy it-girl, this is your perfect match. Not only does it meet your style standards, but you also don't have to worry about breaking it. It's made with a mineral crystal that protects the case, ensuring a long life for this beauty. In addition, it has a water resistance of 50 meters / 165 feet / 5 atm, so you can relinquish that fear of water damage if you get caught in the rain. So whether you're on the job, at a fancy dinner, out for a night on the town, or on your way to do something wild with your girls, you'll be sure to be ahead of the game in vogue with this timepiece.Important Information for Orders Shipping Outside of the United States Orders that are shipped to countries outside of the U.S. may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. By law, we must declare all items at the value of payment received and cannot alter this amount to decrease international custom fees. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such Import Fees and administrative fees which are levied once a shipment reaches your country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be borne by the recipient; we have no control over these charges. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; you should contact your local customs office for further information. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause delays beyond our control and beyond the original delivery estimates. If you refuse a shipment from AreaTrend, you will be responsible for the original shipping charges, any customs or taxes, and the cost of returning the package to AreaTrend. This amount will be deducted from your merchandise refund. In the event that the return fee exceeds the order total, the package will be abandoned and you will not be refunded.
Title: Marc Jacobs Women's Riley MJ3539 Silver Stainless-Steel Quartz Fashion Watch

ReturnPolicy.Description:
Everything we do here at AreaTrend is centered around our customers. For this reason we are proud to offer our 365 day no hassle return policy!

Within 365 days of your order date, provided your product is still in its original box with all materials and has not been worn, used or sized your product is eligible for return.** 

That's right! An entire year to return, and no restocking fee! Buy any gifts early and rest easy knowing that if the recipient is not 100% happy with it they are able to return it at their convenience. 

Just fill out the return form on the bottom of your packing slip and include it with your return. In addition, if your order was shipped within the United States, you may choose to use the return label on the reverse side of your packing slip. If you use this label a flat fee of $6.95 will be deducted from your refund. If you use the included label, simply drop off the package at your local post office, a post office mail box or give the package to your local carrier. Or, if you choose, you may contact us for an RMA number and ship your return via another method of your liking. 

Here are some additional details:

You can return your watch for refund, exchange, or store credit.

Upon arrival please check your watch for any manufacturer defects. To prevent having to go through the warranty process defective items must be brought to our attention within 10 days of receipt. After 10 days, defective items are no longer eligible for return, and you must use warranty repair for your product at this time. 

When returning an item, we suggest purchasing insurance for the return shipment. Please note that we are not responsible for return liability.

You will receive an automated email once your return has been checked in to our returns department. Your return will then be processed within 3-7 business days and a refund, exchange or store credit will be issued less original shipping charges. If your original shipping was free, a flat shipping fee of $5.00 will be deducted from your refund. 

Please note, if any return is sent back to us as RTS (Return To Sender) by the carrier, an additional $5.00 fee will be deducted from your refund. In the event that your order is returned to us undeliverable by the carrier at customs clearance, the refund provided to your account will be applied less any amount we were charged by the carrier and customs to have your package enter your country.

Remember, if at any time you have questions or concerns let us know! We have real live people standing by ready to help. Our toll free number is 1-877-493-6847, and we are available here Monday through Friday, 9AM to 5PM EST.
